titleStmt.title: Seasonable observations humbly offered to his highness the Lord Protector By Samuel Lambe of London, merchant.
titleStmt.author: Lambe, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the authors charge, for the use and benefit of the English nation, and to be considered of, and put in execution, as the high court of Parliament, in their great wisdoms, shall think meet;

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
The second sequence of pagination begins with caption title: A Post-script.
In this editon, the colophon does not include the bookseller's name William Hope. Wing reports edition with "to be sold by William Hope" in colophon.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: the use and benefit of the English nation, and to be considered of, and put

place.placeName: execution, as the high court of Parliament, in their great wisdoms, shall think meet
